General.Name: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc.
General.Description: Allied Gaming & Entertainment Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a public esports and entertainment company worldwide. It operates esports properties to connect players and fans through a network of connected arenas; and creates original esports content. The company also operates a flagship gaming arena located at the Luxor Hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada, as well as focuses on exploring opportunities in the mobile games markets. In addition, it focuses on orchestrating live entertainment events and offers management and consultation service to experiential entertainment venue operation. Further, the company operates a mobile esports truck that serves as a battleground and content generation hub, as well as a studio for recording and streaming gaming events. The company is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 745 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10151
